title.rendered: How to create and add a dial status of campaign?

content.rendered:
Step # 1

Login to admin panel

2

1

Click on visit admin panel button.

2

2

Add given login details into login form and click on Login Button.

Step # 2

Create new dial status.

2

1

Click global dial status link from left side menu.

2

2

Dial Statuses, where you can simply add your dial status by simple click on +Add button.

2

3

By click on +Add button, you will find Create Dial Status form. Add the status, status name, check desired checkboxes and click submit button.

2

4

That’s it, dail status is successfully added and ready to add to your desired campaign.

Step # 3

Add dial status to campaign.

2

1

Click campaign link from left side menu.

2

2

Click on edit button from the list.

2

3

By click on Edit button, you will redirect to edit campaign form. Find status drop down field.

2

4

Now find your dial status (just created one) in drop down and check it.

2

5

Click on submit button.

3-6.

That’s it, Your dial status in successfully added to the campaign.
